languages.text: {n}Взгляд Ксавьера скользит по вашей свите, задерживаясь на Маражае.{/n} "Инцендия допустила, чтобы по Футфолу разгуливал ксенос самого опасного рода. Удивительно, что многоуважаемая Чорда настолько чтит ваши привилегии Вольного Торговца".

{n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Ксавьера скользит по вашей свите, задерживаясь на Маражае.{/n} "Инцендия допустила, чтобы по Футфолу разгуливал ксенос самого опасного рода. Удивительно, что многоуважаемая Чорда настолько чтит ваши привилегии Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam about on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for your Rogue Trader privileges."

{n}Xavier gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam about on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for your Rogue Trader privileges."

{n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for your Rogue Trader privileges."

{n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎粗略地扫了一眼你的随行人员。到最后，他的目光落在了玛拉斋身上。{/n}“因森蒂娅居然允许最为危险的异形在落脚港到处游荡。看得出来，尊敬的库尔达女士对你的行商浪人特权非常尊重。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

traits.locale_text: {n}希维尔粗略地扫了一眼你的随行人员。到最后，他的目光落在了玛拉斋身上。{/n}“因森蒂娅居然允许最为威胁的异形在落脚港到处游荡。看得出来，尊敬的库尔达女士对你的行商浪人特权非常尊重。”

languages.text: {n}カルカサルはあなたをさっと見た後、マラズハイへと視線を落とした。{/n}「インセンディアが最も危険な異種族に、自由にフットフォールをうろつかせるているとはな。偉大なるチョーダ女帝はお前の令状に与えられた特権に対して、率直に言って驚くほどの敬意を払っている。」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルはあなたをさっと見た後、マラズハイへと視線を落とした。{/n}「インセンディアが最も危険な異種族に、自由にフットフォールをうろつかせるているとはな。偉大なるチョーダ女帝はお前の令状に与えられた特権に対して、率直に言って驚くほどの敬意を払っている。」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar echa un vistazo superficial a tu séquito hasta que su mirada se posa en Marazhai.{/n} «Incendia ha permitido que un xenos de la variedad más peligrosa deambule libremente por Paso. La estimada lady Chorda tiene un respeto francamente sorprendente por los privilegios que le otorga la Patente».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier echa un vistazo superficial a tu séquito hasta que su mirada se posa en Marazhai.{/n} «Incendia ha permitido que un xenos de la variedad más peligrosa deambule por Paso. La estimada Lady Chorda tiene un respeto francamente sorprendente por sus privilegios de Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}Calcazar lässt seinen Blick kurz über dein Gefolge streifen, bis er auf Marazhai zu ruhen kommt.{/n} "Incendia hat einem Xenos der gefährlichsten Sorte gestattet, frei auf Footfall herumzulaufen. Die verehrte Lady Chorda hat erstaunlich viel Achtung vor den Privilegien, die Euch Euer Handelsbrief gewährt."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier lässt seinen Blick kurz über dein Gefolge streifen, bis er auf Marazhai zu ruhen kommt.{/n} "Incendia hat einem Xenos der gefährlichsten Sorte gestattet, frei auf Footfall herumzulaufen. Die verehrte Lady Chorda hat erstaunlich viel Achtung vor Euren Privilegien als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: {n}Alors que Calcazar promène rapidement son regard sur les membres de votre entourage, il s'arrête soudainement sur Marazhai.{/n} « Incendia a permis à un xénos de la pire espèce de se promener librement à Castel, à ce que je vois. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que l'honorable dame Chorda ait autant de respect pour les privilèges attachés à votre lettre de marque. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que Xavier promène rapidement son regard sur les membres de votre entourage, il s'arrête soudainement sur Marazhai.{/n} « Incendia a permis à un xénos de la pire espèce de se promener librement à Castel, à ce que je vois. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que l'honorable dame Chorda ait autant de respect pour vos privilèges de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, maiyetine üstünkörü göz atıp nihayet bakışlarını Marazhai'a konduruyor.{/n} "İncendia, en tehlikeli türe mensup bir zenonun Binliman'da serbestçe dolaşmasına göz yummuş. Muhterem Leydi Chorda'nın Ruhsatnamenizden aldığı yetkilere olan saygı seviyesi açıkçası beni şaşırttı."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives your retinue a cursory glance until his gaze rests on Marazhai.{/n} "Incendia has allowed a xenos of the most dangerous variety to roam freely on Footfall. The esteemed Lady Chorda has a frankly surprising amount of respect for the privileges bestowed by your Warrant."
